title: The Mysterious Death of George Reeves
author: BuzzFeed Unsolved Network
description:
A Hollywood actor is found dead - was it suicide or murder? Make sure to leave your questions for our Post Mortem episode in the comments!

Credits: https://www.buzzfeed.com/bfmp/videos/124518

Welcome to the BuzzFeed Unsolved Network! This channel is your one-stop destination for all things mystery, conspiracy, supernatural, true crime, and everything in between. Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/2zuaR06.

localize.description:
ハリウッド俳優の遺体が発見されましたが、これは自殺なのでしょうか、それとも殺人なのでしょうか？死後のエピソードへの質問をコメント欄にお寄せください。

クレジット: https://www.buzzfeed.com/bfmp/videos/124518
